name: medusa2-marketplace-demo
description: This is a demo project which how to create a marketplace demo using [Medusa 2.0](https://medusajs.com/)

scripts.setupMedusaServer: cd medusa-marketplace-demo && yarn && npx medusa db:setup --db marketplace && npx medusa db:migrate && yarn dev
scripts.setupMedusaUserSeed: cd medusa-marketplace-demo && npx medusa user --email test@example.com --password Password123 && yarn seed
scripts.setupWebsite: cd website && yarn && yarn build && yarn dev
scripts.setup: npm run setupMedusaServer && npm run setupMedusaUser && npm run setupWebsite
scripts.db:backup: mkdir -p ./backups && docker exec -t marketplace-db-postgres pg_dump -U marketplace -d marketplace --clean --if-exists > ./backups/marketplace-$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).sql
scripts.db:restore:
echo '
Available backups:' && ls -l ./backups/ && echo '
To restore, run: npm run db:restore-file --file=<filename>'
scripts.db:restore-file: if [ -f "./backups/$npm_config_file" ]; then cat ./backups/$npm_config_file | docker exec -i marketplace-db-postgres psql -U marketplace -d marketplace; else echo "Error: Backup file './backups/$npm_config_file' not found"; fi
scripts.db:restore-latest: cat $(ls -t ./backups/*.sql | head -n1) | docker exec -i marketplace-db-postgres psql -U marketplace -d marketplace
